name: OpenBindings Software
description: Base contract for software participating in the OpenBindings delegation ecosystem. Defines the getInfo operation and SoftwareInfo schema for self-identification. Any delegate interface (e.g., binding-format-handler) imports this interface so that its getInfo operation can satisfy the canonical definition here.

SoftwareInfo.description: Identity and metadata for a piece of software.

version.description: Software implementation version (e.g., '0.3.0'). Independent of any format spec version.

description.description: Brief description of what this software does.

homepage.description: URL to documentation or project page.

getInfo.description: Return identity and metadata about this software.
